page.title: 01MONTFORD AREA - AN OVERVIEW
page.content:
This is a very pleasant and quite secluded part of Shropshire, once you get away from the busy A5, London - Holyhead road which passes through.
The area is almost entirely covered by intensively cultivated farmland, but with fewer farm labourers, most of the residents now commute to the nearby towns for work.
Most of its small population is concentrated in five close-knit communities. Its inhabitants have to go out of the area for their schooling and for most of their shopping and recreational needs.
Key topics for concern at present are the exact routing of the new Shrewsbury by-pass and the disturbance from parachutists at Forton airfield.
